title: Tech-Savvy Assistant
job_overview:
Organic bread mix brand (Germany) looking for a reliable, technically curious helper to automate and manage key tasks.

--Tasks
-Set up apps in Shopify
-Upload & manage products on Amazon (via flat files)
-Build automations in MAKE (Integromat) / Zapier
-Work with data in Google Sheets/Excel

--Bonus (Nice-to-Have)
-ERPNext experience
-Familiar with Amazon PPC or ads
-Comfort using AI tools

--What We Need
-Quick, proactive, and reliable
-Strong with tools, even if not a dev
-Independent + clear communicator

? To Apply
-Answer this in your message:
-Do you have a verified Amazon account we can add to manage ours?

???? Also Attach
-Short Loom/video (1–2 min) showing past work or tools you've used
-Screenshot of Shopify/Amazon dashboards you've worked in
-Optional: short work history or client reference

Thanks for taking the time to apply — we’re excited to find someone great to grow with us!
